attributes.action: Stop giving child benefit to parents who spend the money on cigarettes and alcohol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I see parents withdrawing their child benefit, then go to the off licence next door to the post office to buy cigarettes and alcohol with the money. The money should benefit their child(ren) - hence the name not their feed their habit of tobacco and alcohol. It's sick!
